short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension for whom using Gmail HTML Basic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was mainly inspired by a userscript named GMail Basic HTML Enhancement.

This extension enabled user
* Relocation labels to top of messages list
* Select All button
* Search shortcut like :unread, 2 week older
* Save the last selected action in [Go] menu
* Create [New label] in filter wizard, no need to create it ahead
